title: Backbreaker Vengeance
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Backbreaker Vengeance takes the intensity and AAA appeal of the original Backbreaker Football and combines it with the pick-up-and-play nature of the million-selling mobile games to create a whole new one-of-a-kind sports experience Xbox LIVE Arcade! It takes as its inspiration the wildly popular “Tackle Alley” mini-game in Backbreaker Football to deliver an all-new arcade slant on football!  Three single player- and multiplayer modes; Tackle Alley, Vengeance, and Supremacy. 350 Waves in 70 unique Challenges Split-screen 2 player and AI multiplayer modes Euphoria-fueled dynamic motion for unpredictable and un-canned animations – no two tackles are ever the same! Relive key moments with the feature-packed in-game replay system. Complete Challenges to unlock new teams Amazing visuals – NaturalMotion’s Morpheme animation technology, realistic stadium lighting and weather effects, high-quality character models and tons of stadium spectators make for a true triple-A presentation!

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Backbreaker Vengeance Launch Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get ready of the most intense action sports game this summer! Fight your way to the endzone, avoiding euphoria-powered opponents on the way to score the ultimate touchdown! Or turn the tables: take down that cocky running back in style, scoring extra points for big tackles. All the action is powered by NaturalMotion’s euphoria engine, so you’ll never see the same tackle twice. And with three modes (Tackle Alley, Vengeance, Supremacy), 350 original Waves, and online + splitscreen multiplayer, Backbreaker Vengeance is packed with content for hours and hours of new gameplay.

childDownloads.title: Backbreaker Vengeance Trailer
childDownloads.description: Whether you takedown or touchdown…it’s Vengeance! Backbreaker Vengeance delivers an all-new arcade experience of American football with unprecedented hard hits, no pre-canned tackles, just jaw-dropping graphics.

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Backbreaker Vengeance Trial
childDownloads.description: Backbreaker: Vengeance takes the intensity and AAA appeal of the original Backbreaker Football console game and combines it with the pick-up-and-play nature of the multi-million selling mobile games to create a whole new one-of-a-kind sports experience for digital download on Xbox LIVE Arcade for Xbox 360.  It takes as its inspiration the wildly popular “Tackle Alley” mini-game in Backbreaker Football to deliver an all-new arcade slant on football, with the follwing features  • Three single player modes and multiplayer modes; Tackle Alley, Vengeance, and Supremacy. • Each mode contains 10 challenges and 5 waves in each • Split-screen 2 player and AI multiplayer modes • Compete on a global scale with the Online Rival system; objective-fueled leaderboards • Euphoria-fueled dynamic motion allow unpredictable and un-canned animations – no two tackles are ever the same! • On-the-field camera puts you in the middle of the action • Dodge on-field obstacles with Euphoria-powered characters • Re-play key moments with the feature-packed in-game replay system. • Complete Challenges to unlock new teams • Amazing visuals – NaturalMotion’s Morpheme animation technology, realistic stadium lighting and weather effects, high-quality character models and tons of stadium spectators make for a true triple-A presentation!	   Backbreaker: Vengeance marks the first time the series has been available as a digital download via Xbox LIVE Arcade for Xbox 360 , featuring non-stop, hard-hitting arcade action; bone-crunching tackles; and tons of swagger from end-zone to end-zone.
